description:
Simple life tracking application, based on my phone based Warrior Life Counter. It was originally designed for Wizard of the Coast's Magic the Gathering game and currently supports the following game modes: Standard MTG (20 life),  Poison counter tracking (MTG), Yu-Gi-Oh mode (8000 life).

This version also has the following features:

2, 3 and 4 player modes
Customizable player names
Flipping life counters (for players on the other side of the tablet)
Magic Card look-up using magiccards.info
Keep Screen on option
Yu-Gi-Oh mode 
Negative Life option
Randomly choose a starting player

This version does not currently have support EDH/Commander Magic but this feature will be added in an upcoming version.
versionNote: Yu-Gi-Oh mode, 2 player mode, starting player random chooser.
